an8.91-117:1.1: Atha kho bojjha upasika, sirima, paduma, sutana, manuja, uttara, mutta, khema, ruci, cundi, bimbi, sumana, mallika, tissa, tissamata, sona, sonaya mata, kana, kanamata, uttara nandamata, visakha migaramata, khujjuttara upasika, samavati upasika, suppavasa koliyadhita, suppiya upasika, nakulamata gahapatani.
